column6:
Freestanding 1920 warehouse building converted to 3,200 sq/ft urban loft with panoramic rooftop deck. 2 bedrooms, 2 and 1/2 baths on two levels. 
Meeting space 20'x30'. Gated lot, attached garage, 4 parking spots.
Available for film, photography, conferences and events.
Business conference and meetings $250 to $1,000
Corporate overnight discount avail before a daytime event.
Film and photography $750/whole day.
Events up to 25 guests $1,250
Events for 25-40 guests start at $1,500
